title: AWS Athena Query Performance
description: Use SQL, partitioning, and data layout strategies to improve Athena reliability and speed.
outcomes: Tune Athena queries for latency and cost
Handle schema and partition changes safely
Diagnose large dataset and connectivity failures

lessons.title: Working with Partitioned Data
lessons.objective: Design efficient partition strategies for large tables.

lessons.title: Troubleshooting Performance with Large Datasets
lessons.objective: Find and resolve scan-heavy workload bottlenecks.

lessons.title: Troubleshooting Common Query Errors
lessons.objective: Fix syntax, permission, and data-type query errors.

lessons.title: Handling Schema Changes in Athena Tables
lessons.objective: Manage evolving source schemas without breakage.

lessons.title: Resolving Connectivity Issues with Data Sources
lessons.objective: Recover from connection and catalog integration failures.
